To preview HTML file stored in JCR you don't have to open additional browser window. With eXo IDE all you need is to click on *"Show Preview"* _Toolbar_ button or select *"Run->Show Preview"* from top menu after opening HTML file in _Content Panel_. After this HTML-content will be opened as Web-page in IFRAME of _Preview Tab_.
{note}
* It is impossible to view just created and non-saved files.
* Unsaved changes are not displayed when you edit HTML file.
{note}
